title: 4 news The Idaho teacher accused of feeding a puppy to a snapping turtle has been charged with animal cruel
content: Preston Junior High School science teacher Robert Crosland was charged Friday. He faces up to six months in jail and a $5,000 fine if convicted. The school is in rural Preston, where the 2004 teen cult classic film “Napoleon Dynamite” was set.      Attempts to reach Crosland at the school Friday were not successful.
